source_caption_data.pre_caption: This third-person, top-down video starts with an extreme wide shot, showing a character in the upper-center of the frame, positioned in the middle ground of a cave. In the foreground, a user interface is displayed, with status bars at the top-left, a minimap at the top-right, and a hotbar along the bottom. The camera follows the character as they move downwards, causing the scenery to scroll and reveal minecart tracks on the left and a wooden platform that comes to occupy the lower half of the frame. The character walks onto the platform, moving to the center of the screen. A large inventory menu then appears as a foreground overlay, covering most of the frame. The menu closes, returning to the extreme wide shot with the character now stationary in the center of the wooden platform in the middle ground.
